evidence.claim: The company utilizes FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
There is a reference to HL7 compliance for health data processing.
Newton Hewitt & Co demonstrates использование of Cloud Services like AWS for their platforms.
Company documents mention the integration with EHR platforms facilitating data exchange via X12 transaction sets.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found regarding X12 or clearinghouse services.
